descriptors.name: bootloader-spi-ezsp-nonsecure
descriptors.label: Bootloader - NCP EZSP SPI Non-Secure part of Bootloader using TrustZone
descriptors.description: TrustZone is used to split into a Secure and Non-Secure bootloader. This is the non-secure part of the bootloader. The secure part of the bootloader, which contains the core functionalities needs to be built separately and used together with the non-secure part of the bootloader.

properties.value: brd2503a brd2601a brd2601b brd2603a brd4171a brd4176a brd4180a brd4180b brd4180z brd4181a brd4181b brd4181c brd4182a brd4184a brd4184b brd4185a brd4186a brd4186b brd4186c brd4187a brd4187b brd4187c brd4188a brd4188b brd4191a brd4194a brd4195a brd4196a brd4204a brd4204b brd4204c brd4204d brd4205a brd4205b brd4210a brd4263a brd4263b brd4263c brd4264a brd4264b brd4264c brd4265a brd4265b brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a brd4273a brd4308a brd4308b brd4308c brd4308d brd4310a brd4311a brd4311b brd4312a brd4316a brd4317a brd4319a brd4328a brd4330a brd4331a com.silabs.board.none
